title: Massive wildfire in southern Turkey spreads, prompting evacuations
content:
1. Massive wildfire in southern Turkey spreads, prompting evacuations  Global News
  2. Residents flee as winds fan massive wildfire in southern Turkey  Reuters
  3. Turkey: Homes evacuated as fire rages near town  WIVB.com - News 4
  4. Fatal forest fire near Turkish resort may have been started deliberately  RTÉ News
  5. Three dead as wildfires blaze on southern Turkish coast  Reuters
